description:
A hero of the Crusades and the First King of the United Kingdoms of Illyria. He fought against the Gears to save humanity, but meeting Dizzy, who would become his wife, led him to reconsider coexistence between humans and Gears. Though he and his son, Sin, were once estranged, they now share a close family bond.
Source: Official page
name: Ky Kiske
